caption.title: Comparison of two different PERMANOVA models testing the effect of biological sample type (invaded or control), organism (plant, mammal, mussel), and their interactions, on the structure of the environmental microbiome.
caption.p: In Model 1 we included studyID and speciesID as stratification factor, while in Model 2 we included studyID, speciesID and environment (soil or water) as stratification factors.
Click here for additional data file.
